channel.title: Cupcake on This is Wei
channel.description: Recent content in Cupcake on This is Wei

item.title: Cupcakes
item.description: Cupcakes are normally not my go-to choices for dessert. I still do have my favorite cupcake spots. Two Little Red Hens has been listed as the No. 1 dessert spot in NYC. This place not only offers great cheesecakes but also awesome cupcakes. We couldn’t have enough of the cupcake with the mini yellow cupcake with Swiss vanilla buttercream. We got a regular sized one in additional. As they advertised, it was silky smooth and not too sweet.

item.title: 2017 Partial Solar Eclipse NYC
item.description: It has been years since the last time that I saw a partial solar eclipse in China. I remembered to look out the window of a 6-floor apartment building in an open area was pretty awesome. Plus, there had no clouds on that day, which was very rare in my hometown. The entire process didn’t last that long but enough for me to enjoy. Today, I was able to see the partial solar eclipse again in NYC.
